title: Local Hour: I Know What I’m Watching
description:
After a weekend full of concussions in the NFL and the conversations surrounding them, Dan, Stu, and the crew discuss the Tua, Teddy Bridgewater, if the NFL is "overreacting," and analyzing head injuries on what they are against how they look.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
